Akinado Nada Nissa

Akinado Nada Nissa is a Tarot-inspired game / journey - to be enjoyed solo, or in a group.

Akinado is now in development stage. If you want to hear about it when it’s ready to launch, I invite you to subscribe to my Moonly Review.

- Co-created with Jasmeen Hana and Silvia Bastos at the Gathering of the Tribes 2022.

13 October 2022 · games · projects
